text: Somatidia nitida is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Broun in 1880. It contains the varietas Somatidia nitida var. variegata.BioLib.cz - Somatidia. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1880
title: Somatidia nitida
